sentence.text: Today, more than a dozen human negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation missense mutations have been described, all found in patients with severe cardiac arrhythmias.

entity.text: negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation

sentence.text: However, sequencing of large human cohorts reveals a cumulative frequency of additional rare negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation mutations that raise the possibility of CaM variants not exclusively causing severe cardiac arrhythmias.

entity.text: negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation
